title: Impeachment, 2020 Fundraising, Vaping Ban
itunes:title: Impeachment, 2020 Fundraising, Vaping Ban
description:
Panel Guests: Lincoln Mitchell, Political Analyst and Democratic activist and Dan Perkins, Author and Republican commentator.

Guest host June Grasso also spoke with Bloomberg Law’s Jacquie Lee about the Trump Administration’s ban on some flavored vaping products.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
